LanguageData.JoycstasyTolerance.label: Joycstasy tolerance
LanguageData.JoycstasyTolerance.description: Homemade merchant drug made from ambrosia and Devil's mushroom extracts. It improves mood and mental stability, but is addictive and negative effects when breaking.
